answers.answer: I am 57 yrs old and like yourself have had problems like these since I was 18!  I just had a sleep study and discovered I stop breathing for 88 seconds (!!!) 16-18 times per hour all night...for almost 40 years!  Please get a sleep study right away.  This problem can lead to heart disease, weight gain, diabetes and many many other disorders.

question: when i sleep on my back or my side i gasp for air...i seem to do it more when i on my back and sometimes wake up gagging and coughing with alot of saliva in my throat. im 24 and this has gone on for a while now. i am in good health and 7 months pregnant. i feel like someone has sucked the breath right out of me.....please help. thanks
title: please answer4
